OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CITY COUNCIL OLDER PEOPLES READERS GROUP

Desc.entry: Consults older people about how council communications such as mailings, publications, leaflets, internet pages and any other literature is viewed by its customers. The group discusses these items and offer suggestions on how the communications can be improved in terms of content, layout, appearance etc. Offers the opportunity for members to meet new friends and to have a say in how the council communicates to its customers. New members welcome.
